item.title: Pokemon Fan Shows Off Adorable Bulbasaur-Themed Valentine's Day Gift
item.description:
Summary

  • A Pokemon fan created adorable Bulbasaur-themed gifts for their Valentine, charming fans of the series.
  • The Bulbasaur-themed Poke Balls were designed by a third party and created using a 3D printer.
  • Customized Poke Balls with iconic Pokemon elements have grown in popularity, sparking interest in fan-made designs for each Pokemon.

A Pokemon fan has shared the adorable Bulbasaur-themed gifts they've made for their wife for Valentine's Day. The Pokemon present is charming fans of the series, and is just one instance of how fans integrate Pokemon into everyday life.

WIth over 1,000 Pokemon now in the franchise, chances are that every player or viewer of Pokemon media has a favorite. However, as the first Pokemon in the original Pokedex and one of the original starters, Bulbasaur has a special place in the hearts of many fans. It seems this person's Valentine is one of them.

Reddit user things_i_make shared the two Bulbasaur-themed Poke Balls they made for their wife for Valentine's Day. The two designs carry over traits that are readily recognizable as Bulbasaur's, like its bluish-green color, spots, cat-like pointy ears, and the bulb on its back. However, the fan has also included a second one that changes up the design to a cute pink variant, putting a rosebud on the Bulbasaur's back instead of the traditional bulb. It's a pair of gifts that would likely be received well by just about any Bulbasaur fan on Valentine's Day.

Pokemon Fans Ask Questions

Numerous fans of Bulbasaur and Pokemon in general have shared how impressed they are with the creator, but there's also been a number of questions asked about how the two were made. Things_i_make explained that the designs were created by a third party, who offers them for sale, which can then be built using a 3D printer. For the pink Bulbasaur ball, things_i_make used a X1C printer with matte red and pink Bambu filament. The green one was printed with resin instead, and after some sanding, was airbrushed with the iconic green and blues Bulbasaur can be recognized by. Those who are curious about printing their own can potentially follow the same process.

Customized Poke Balls have become popular as of late, with creative designs integrating iconic elements of a Pokemon directly into the Poke Ball. In the past, many fans have expressed interest in the idea of Poke Balls like these appearing in an actual game, or a Poke Ball changing to reflect which pocket monster is housed inside of it. While introducing a Poke Ball design for every single Pokemon in the franchise would likely be too time-consuming for Game Freak to actually implement, if fans keep at it, they may end up inventing and producing designs for them all on their own.

item.title: Honkai: Star Rail Leak Teases Mr. Reca's Potential Release Window
item.description:
Summary

  • Mr. Reca might become playable in Version 3.3, rumored to be a 4-Star Remembrance unit.
  • The upcoming collaboration with Fate/Stay Night may introduce limited 4-Star characters.
  • New playable characters, Castorice and Anaxa, are teased for Version 3.2, leaving 3 Chrysos Heirs remaining.

A new Honkai: Star Rail leak has teased that Mr. Reca might become playable in Version 3.3. Honkai: Star Rail recently added the Remembrance as a playable Path, and several characters of this class are expected in future updates.

Players first encountered Mr. Reca in-game during Honkai: Star Rail Version 2.6 in Penacony. Although fans were excited about his arrival, Mr. Reca was introduced as an NPC, while Rappa made her debut as a playable character. Mr. Reca has not appeared in-game again, but he has been heavily rumored to become playable in later patches. HoYoverse has not drip-marketed Mr. Reca for Honkai: Star Rail 's Version 3.1 banners, so fans may not be receiving news about his playability yet. However, a new leak suggests that it won't be long before the character joins the roster.

A new leak from Galaxy_Leak and UncleGreekMilk indicated that Mr. Reca's kit is complete, and he would likely become playable sometime during Version 3.3. Earlier Honkai: Star Rail leaks about Mr. Reca suggested that he would be a 4-Star Remembrance unit, which would make him the first 4-Star character of this class. During the Penacony storyline, it was revealed that Mr. Reca is a Memokeeper, like Black Swan, so he canonically follows the Aeon Fuli and the Remembrance. There is a chance that Honkai: Star Rail decided to keep Mr. Reca as an NPC until more playable Remembrance units were introduced, but now it could be only a matter of time before his debut.

Honkai: Star Rail Leak Reveals Mr. Reca's Potential Release for Version 3.3

Aside from Mr. Reca's potential release window, the leak also sheds light on Honkai: Star Rail 's collaboration with Fate/Stay Night. Per the leak, one of the two crossover playable units will be a limited 4-Star in Honkai: Star Rail . Previous rumors teased that the popular characters Archer and Saber from the anime saga would be featured in HoYoverse's game. The collaboration is expected to launch during the third quarter of 2025. Finally, the leak revealed that another 4-Star character could debut in Version 3.7 and that they could serve as a support unit for the rumored Cyrene.

Honkai: Star Rail recently shared promotional images of two new playable characters, Castorice and Anaxa, for Version 3.2. This means that only three Chrysos Heirs remain in line to join the playable roster. Honkai: Star Rail 's upcoming 3.1 update is set to launch in late February, and fans can expect more information about the patch during a special livestream on February 14.

item.title: Roblox: Mall Tycoon Codes (February 2025)
item.description:
Mall Tycoon is a well-made and exciting business simulator that stands out among similar Roblox games with various mechanics and actions that will not make you bored. Here, you must build and develop your shopping center, constantly reinvesting the money you earn.

You can redeem Mall Tycoon codes to boost your progress in the game and grow your business faster. Each code offers generous rewards that you can use to improve your mall, so be sure to take advantage of the opportunity.

Updated February 13, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Codes are a fantastic way to earn rewards without grinding. Stay updated and donâ€™t let them go to waste.

All Mall Tycoon Codes

Working Mall Tycoon Codes

  • grandmasfavouritefriend - Redeem this code to get Legendary Store.
  • legendary - Redeem this code to get Legendary Store.

Expired Mall Tycoon Codes

Currently, there are no expired Mall Tycoon codes.

Whether you are a beginner or an experienced player, the rewards offered by Mall Tycoon codes will be a nice bonus for developing your business. However, it is worth noting that each code has a specific expiration date, so if you want to get all the rewards, redeem them as soon as possible.

How to Redeem Codes in Mall Tycoon

Mall Tycoon 's redemption system is very similar to those used in other Roblox games, so if you've redeemed codes elsewhere before, you'll have no problem doing so here. However, if you face difficulties, or you are redeeming codes for the first time, here are detailed instructions on how to do it in Mall Tycoon :

  • Launch Mall Tycoon .
  • Pay attention to the left side of the screen. There will be several buttons arranged in a column. Among them, find and interact with the second one, which says Profile.
  • After doing so, you will open a menu with many buttons and options. Here, in the upper-left corner of the screen, you'll see a blue Codes button. Click on it.
  • That will open the redemption menu. Below it, there will be an input field and a green Enter button. Now, enter manually, or better yet, copy and paste one of the above-mentioned active codes into the input field.
  • Finally, click on the green Enter button to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, a notification will appear with a list of rewards received.

How to Get More Mall Tycoon Codes

Although you can always visit this page to find the latest Roblox codes, you can also search for them manually by visiting the game's official social media. The developers of Mall Tycoon regularly share new codes on the official X account, so you can visit this page occasionally to be one of the first to find them and get rewards.

item.title: Roblox: Sprunki Tower Defense Codes (February 2025)
item.description:
Sprunki Tower Defense is a Roblox experience, where you will need to defend a base from evil monsters with the help of Sprunki characters. In this game, you will be able to complete levels with other players, make friends, and earn currency to unlock a variety of Sprunki towers with different stats.

Codes for Sprunki Tower Defense will help you get some in-game currency and other bonuses that will be useful for both beginners and experienced players. Therefore, if you want to buy a new character faster or become stronger in this game, you should redeem Sprunki Tower Defense codes that we have collected for you below.

Updated February 13, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Use the codes below to earn extra coins and spins to help you unlock new upgrades. Whether you're just starting out or have been playing for a while, these rewards can give you an edge. Stay tuned for updates and new codes in the future.

All Sprunki Tower Defense Codes

Working Sprunki Tower Defense Codes

  • sprunki - Redeem this code to get 500 coins
  • ibugouspins - Redeem this code to get 5 spins
  • ibugoucoins - Redeem this code to get 2000 coins
  • limacoins - Redeem this code to get 2000 coins
  • limaspins - Redeem this code to get 5 spins
  • carrapixocoins - Redeem this code to get 2000 coins
  • carrapixospins - Redeem this code to get 5 spins
  • dudubeterocoins - Redeem this code to get 2000 coins
  • dudubeterospins - Redeem this code to get 5 spins
  • dpspedrocoins - Redeem this code to get 2000 coins
  • dpspedrospins - Redeem this code to get 5 spins
  • launch - Redeem this code to get 1000 coins

Expired Sprunki Tower Defense Codes

  • NEWUPDATE - Redeem this code to get 100 coins
  • PASSFIXED - Redeem this code to get 150 coins

How to Redeem Codes for Sprunki Tower Defense

The code redemption system in Sprunki Tower Defense is pretty straightforward and simple as it is similar to the one used in other free Roblox games, so you shouldn't have any problems with it. However, if you are a beginner or can't find where to redeem codes, follow the step-by-step instructions below:

  • Firstly, launch Sprunki Tower Defense in Roblox .
  • After that, pay attention to the right side of the screen, where you can see a button with a bird on it.
  • Click on it, and you will see a menu with a code redemption field.
  • Enter, or better yet, copy and paste one of the above codes and click Redeem.

If everything is done correctly, you will receive a notification that the code is redeemed. However, if this does not happen, and you cannot redeem one of the codes, it may be expired. Also, make sure that you entered the code correctly and that you didn't enter an extra space, as these are some of the most common mistakes.

Keep in mind that this game may require you to re-enter the game after each code entry to see your rewards.

How to Get More Sprunki Tower Defense Codes

If you're looking for more Roblox codes, be sure to check out the game's official social media. Here, along with other content, the developers often share codes, so be careful not to miss them:

  • Official Sprunki Tower Defense Roblox game page.

item.title: Roblox: Shoot Wall Simulator Codes (February 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • How to Redeem Codes in Shoot Wall Simulator
  • How to Play Shoot Wall Simulator
  • The Best Roblox Simulator Games Like Shoot Wall Simulator
  • About the Shoot Wall Simulator Developers

Shoot Wall Simulator is one of the most popular games on Roblox , not to mention one of the most intuitive. However, users still need to train a lot to progress in the game, which can sometimes mean a lot of grinding. Thankfully, it's possible for Roblox players to accelerate this process by redeeming the Shoot Wall Simulator codes found below.

Updated February 13, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Whether you need extra bullets, potions, or exclusive pets, these codes will give you a boost. Don't forget to use them and improve your gaming experience. Stay tuned for more updates and freebies in the future.

All Shoot Wall Simulator Codes

Working Shoot Wall Simulator Codes

  • Advent2024 - Enter this code to claim Advent Egg.
  • Fruit - Enter this code to claim 500 Oranges.
  • Medic - Enter this code to claim Wins Potions.

All Expired Shoot Wall Simulator Codes

  • Hunter - Enter this code to claim 30 Gems.

How to Redeem Codes in Shoot Wall Simulator

The process of redeeming codes in this game is very simple and quite similar to most other Roblox games with a code redemption system. If players still need help, they can refer to the step-by-step instructions below:

  • First, launch the Shoot Wall Simulator .
  • After that, find and tap or click on the Codes button located in the middle right.
  • When the button is pressed, a menu will appear with the Enter Code field in which it is necessary to enter any of the above codes.
  • To redeem the code, tap or click Submit.

But keep in mind that each code can be redeemed only once.

How to Play Shoot Wall Simulator

It is straightforward to play Shoot Wall Simulator . To make effective progress, players need to shoot and break walls and get Wins. These Wins act as a game currency and can be used to move to new locations. To get Wins faster, it is necessary to buy pets and train. To make this process much more accessible, players will find two buttons at the bottom of the screen: Auto Train and Auto Shoot. Players can press one of them and go into AFK.

The Best Roblox Simulator Games Like Shoot Wall Simulator

If players want to try a new but similar gaming experience but don't know which games to opt for, they will find all the help needed here. Below, they will find 5 games like Shoot Wall Simulator . All of them are of the highest quality and should be enjoyed by fans of this game.

  • Mining Simulator 2
  • Anime Fruit Simulator
  • Bee Swarm Simulator
  • Youtube Simulator Z
  • Clicker Mining Simulator

About the Shoot Wall Simulator Developers

This game was developed by Toptier Production, also known as Wsh Studios. In addition to the Shoot Wall Simulator , they have another quite interesting game called Kung Fu Simulator , which players are recommended to check out.
